summary: As a result of a shipwreck, modern Italian businessman finds himself stuck on a desert island. Like Robinson Crusoe he must find a way to return to civilization, but unlike him - a man of the 20th century is a completely different case.
cast: Paolo Villaggio|Zeudi Araya Cristaldi|Anna Nogara|Percy Hogan
title: Il signor Robinson, mostruosa storia d'amore e d'avventure
